readable.title: 408627152_1feaa4b94e
readable.content: A dog in a life jacket sitting on a boat with a man in the cockpit . A man looking at his small white dog wearing an orange life jacket a shite dog in an orange life vest looking at a man in a blue shirt while riding in a boat . A white dog in a life jacket looks at a man in a boat . A white dog with a life vest accompanies a man in a boat .
